NuoDB for Java

High-performance SQL Database with built-in Elastic Scalability 

NuoDB's cloud database is the ideal platform for developing ACID compliant Java applications for public and private clouds. Use JDBC and Hibernate for out-of-the-box connectivity with Tomcat, WebSphere, JBOSS, WebLogic, and others.

Benefits for Java developers include: 

  • Elastic scalability and performance to handle spikes and dips in web traffic and user connectivity without database partitioning or sharding 
     
  • Rapid dev and test of a multi-node distributed database environment on your local machine 
     
  • Built-in cache for low latency transactions and real-world data consistency  

Download the FREE cloud database today!
